name: Vaulta
description: A sleek, minimal, and secure Solana-based Web3 wallet.
features: Easily send SOL to any Solana address
Instantly airdrop SOL to your wallet
Get a clear overview of your wallet activity

name: Blurt
description: A mobile soundboard app that plays audio when you shake your device.
features: Experience fun times with friends while using it

name: YTDL
description: Terminal-based YouTube downloader with video and audio support.
features: Downloads video and audio in the highest quality.
Supports downloading audio in WAV and MP3 formats.
Runs locally for fast and efficient downloading.
